title: Need a help
body:
Hello RIOT,
I have one problem. Last night I played two games everything was fine. This morning when I tried to run the game through the icon came to me this http://postimg.org/image/ymbn3r051/
I tried to restart the connection twice but it did not help. I would ask for help. Thanks in advance.

replies.body: This error can usually occur from a security setting or permissions problem preventing the game from loading properly.  In many cases, the steps in our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide can resolve this.  I'm glad that the issue has been resolved for you!
mmmmmmm, i'm having the same issue... :x
I fix it. I watched video on YT and prbolem was in my adapter. Administartors, you can lock this.
